content.html: Farewell to this ancient MacBook Air. It saw me through 6(?) years of service in GDS, NHSX, CDDO, DSA, & SGS. I've done the KonMari thing and gave it a little hug goodbye before sending it off to be recycled. And now I can begin the hunt for new stickers for its replacement ðŸ˜„
content.value:
Farewell to this ancient MacBook Air. It saw me through 6(?) years of service in GDS, NHSX, CDDO, DSA, & SGS.

I've done the KonMari thing and gave it a little hug goodbye before sending it off to be recycled.

And now I can begin the hunt for new stickers for its replacement ðŸ˜„

photo.alt: A small silver laptop covered in geeky stickers.
